snippet: Judy Battista, the N.F.L. reporter for The Times, will answer questions from readers.
abstract: Judy Battista, the N.F.L. reporter for The Times, will answer questions from readers.
lead_paragraph: How far can the Broncos and Bengals go in the playoffs? Just what is going on with the Colts and Bears? Can the jets be put back together again? Judy Battista, the N.F.L. reporter for The Times, will answer questions from readers. Use the comment field below for your questions. Answers will appear Friday on The Fifth Down.

headline.main: Have N.F.L. Questions? Judy Battista Has Answers
